label: Ride-sharing platform
content: I think a municipal-supported platform for ride-sharing could be beneficial.

label: Green Bratislava
content: I really like the green spaces in the city. I think we should have more of them. I have prepared a list of places where we could plant new trees, and I would like to share it with you. All of funds for the trees are already secured.

label: Green spaces
content: I found that there is more ecological asphalt available. I think we should use it more.

label: Better digital maps
content: There are lot of new green spaces in the city, but they are not listed on the digital maps. We should invest more time in keeping them up to date.
